item.description: I know this is short notice fellas but I've been busy with daily life. Come out to Sliders off the Berlin Turnpike a lot of my female friends from work will be there and it's my friend's birthday she will be 30!!! Come join me and we will have a good time with people I already know this one is all about social proof!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm tall and have red hair.
item.why: I have social proof there and you will meet new women guaranteed.
item.name: Sliders in Berlin!!
